attributes.action: bring smear tests down from 3 years to 1 year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: come on guys its time to save lives, you may think its no benefit to have a smear test done every year but look at Jade Goody now its time to make a stand.  What if a woman has a smear test done today and in six months time things go wrong but she doesnt know it by the time she has another smear test done bang its to late, we need action NOW
